H0.text: Which is the smallest bird of the crow family. American Crow

H1.text: Which is the smallest bird of the crow family. Fish Crow

H2.text: Which is the smallest bird of the crow family. Common Raven

H3.text: Which is the smallest bird of the crow family. Jackdaw

A4.text: He distinguished the fish crow from John Bartram's great seaside crow by the former's diminutive size when compared to the American crow.

A5.text: The fish crow is smaller and has a silkier, smoother plumage by comparison, and the bill is usually somewhat slimmer.
